Paesli

Open for Business!

Could you use some help around the house? Or do you have a little extra time?

Paesli connects you with your neighbors for personalized, local services to make your home life easier.

About us:

Whether you need a little help with your to-do list, or if you’d like to share your energy and skills with others, Paesli will help you find a perfect match.

Want to be part of something new? We’re taking clients and providers to help shape Paesli as we grow. Right now we’re handcrafting matches: connecting clients with talented, vetted providers for custom support. In the future, clients and providers will find their own perfect matches quickly and directly through our website.

Please tell us about yourself. If you have any questions, please write me at susan@paesli.com
